chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
B: BaseParams
M: MultiParams B
d: Decomposition B M

Goal:
forall (h : name) (p : packet) (ms : list (name * msg)) (l : list packet), In p (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ms ++ l) -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms /\ h = pSrc p \/ In p l

Premises:
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : name; pDst : name; pBody : msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Decomposition : forall B : BaseParams, MultiParams B -> Type
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pDst {P params}
pSrc = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (pSrc, _, _) := p in pSrc : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pSrc {P params}
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
msg = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in msg : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments msg {P MultiParams}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
post_net_analyze_sent_packet : forall (h : name) (p : packet) (ms : list (name * msg)) (xs ys : list packet), In p (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ms ++ xs ++ ys) -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms /\ h = pSrc p \/ In p (xs ++ ys)
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps)
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps)
Build_Decomposition : forall (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) (state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop) (network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop) (network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop), (forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1) -> state_invariant init_handlers -> (forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')) ->...-> Decomposition B M
send_packets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (src : name) (ps : list (name * msg)) => map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := src; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), name -> list (name * msg) -> list packet Arguments send_packets {P params} _ _%list_scope /
network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ps -> pSrc p = h -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') p'
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_old : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' q : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant sigma q -> network_network_invariant p q -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_network_invariant p' q
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = h -> network_network_invariant p p'
step_failure_sind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- BaseParams] ?P : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- FailureParams ?P]
step_failure_ind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- BaseParams] ?P : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- FailureParams ?P]
packet_eta : forall p : packet, {| pSrc := pSrc p; pDst := pDst p; pBody := pBody p |} = p
StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d0 : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed ->...-> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)] where ?P0 : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- BaseParams] ?P : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- FailureParams ?P]
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
Inductive step_failure (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (params : FailureParams P) : step_relation (list name * network) (name * (input + list output)) := StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (failed, net)...
step_drop_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
Inductive step_dup (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> step_dup net net' [] Arguments step_dup {P params} Arguments StepDup_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_dup {P params} _ [net' p] (_ _)%list_scope
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [B : BaseParams M : MultiParams B d : Decomposition B M |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
do_send_packets = fun (P0 : BaseParams) (P : DiskOpMultiParams P0) (src : do_name) (ps : list (do_name * do_msg)) => map (fun m : do_name * do_msg => {| do_pSrc := src; do_pDst := fst m; do_pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P0 : BaseParams) (P : DiskOpMultiParams P0), do_name -> list (do_name * do_msg) -> list do_packet Arguments do_send_packets {P0 P} _ _%list_scope
step_async_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_async_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_dup net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_drop net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_async net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
Inductive step_drop (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> step_drop net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] Arguments step_drop {P params} Arguments StepDrop_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_drop {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope

```coq
```coq
intro h.
intro p.
intro ms.
intro l.
unfold post_net_analyze_sent_packet in H.
destruct H as [H1 H2].
rewrite <- H2 in H1.
destruct H1 as [H3 H4].
split.
+ apply H3.
+ apply H4.
Qed.
